title: Count to 500(Before Riot Staff posts)

embed.description: Count to 500(Before Riot Staff posts) Off Topic & Forum Games

body:
Alright lads, for those of you who have been on forums for a while will now this post, and even though it was created last year it was well alive and kicking until forums got shut, so i'm bringing it back to life here. 

You guys know the go, let's see how far we can get on boards!!

Rules are as followed for the newbies:
*Lets start the count game. Rules are simple.. We simply count to 500 before a Riot Staff posts. Guys please do not post consecutively.  *

I'll kick it off

01

replies.body:
Gonna be closing this duplicate thread and directing ya to the General Discussion one:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/k7NcIiVV-the-number-game

G'luck y'all!
really? i thought we left all these immature posts on the old forums

> really? i thought we left all these immature posts on the old forums

you thought wrong

so u think just because we changed from GD to boards is gonna change peoples way of posting?? 

top kek

epic meme bro xDDDDDDDDDDDD
8 (it'll be interesting to see what formatting makes of a counting thread. Let's try randomly upvoting/downvoting comments on this thread)
9 I am confus its not in order

> [{quoted}](name=RNG Worlds S6,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mE7YQLEl,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2016-07-16T08:58:59.383+0000)
>
> 12?

13. 

There is a post in GD that is further progressed...

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/k7NcIiVV-the-number-game?show=flat&page=35

much post wow

If I was a Riot employee I would make regular searches for these just to post on them.

12

Holy fk, the comments are confusing. 
Stop %%%% posting you plebs and just play the game

5

And of course boards has to make this hard

11
